trans-unit.source: Resolves external XML resources named by a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: Løser eksterne XML-ressurser navnet med en URI Uniform Resource Identifier ().

trans-unit.source: XmlUrlResolver is used to resolve external XML resources such as entities, document type definitions (DTDs) or schemas.
trans-unit.target: XmlUrlResolver brukes til å løse eksterne XML-ressurser for eksempel enheter, dokumentet typedefinisjoner (DTDer) eller XML-skjemaer.

trans-unit.source: It is also used to process include and import elements found in Extensible StyleSheet Language (XSL) style sheets or XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas.
trans-unit.target: Det er også brukes til å behandle inkluderer, og Importer elementene som finnes i omfattende stilarket XSL (Language) stilark eller XML-skjema definition language (XSD) skjemaer.

trans-unit.source: XmlUrlResolver is the default resolver for all classes in the <xref:System.Xml> namespace.
trans-unit.target: XmlUrlResolver er Standardløsningsprogrammet for alle klasser i den <xref:System.Xml>navneområde.</xref:System.Xml>

trans-unit.source: It supports the `file://` and `http://` protocols and requests from the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: Den støtter den `file://` og `http://` protokoller og forespørsler fra <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>klasse.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlUrlResolver objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlUrlResolver objekter kan inneholde sensitiv informasjon, for eksempel brukerlegitimasjonen.

trans-unit.source: You should be careful when you cache XmlUrlResolver objects and should not pass XmlUrlResolver objects to an untrusted component.
trans-unit.target: Du bør være forsiktig når du bufre XmlUrlResolver objekter og skal ikke sende XmlUrlResolver objekter til et uklarert komponent.

trans-unit.source: Resolving DTDs If an XML reader (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>) is reading an XML file that contains an external DTD, it calls the <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntityAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get a stream representation of the DTD.
trans-unit.target: Løsning DTDer Hvis en XML-leseren (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>) leser en XML-fil som inneholder en ekstern DTD, kaller den <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntityAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å få en dataflyt representasjon av DTD.</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntityAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: If the URI of the DTD is a relative URI, the XML reader calls the <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.ResolveUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and returns an absolute URI for the given `relativeUri` and `baseURi` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Hvis URIEN for DTD er en relativ URI, XML-leseren kaller den <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.ResolveUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden og returnerer en absolutt URI for den angitte `relativeUri` og `baseURi` parametere.</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.ResolveUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the XmlUrlResolver doesn't know how to resolve the URI, it returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis XmlUrlResolver vite hvordan du løser URIEN, returneres `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntity%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method uses the information in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.Credentials%2A> property as appropriate to gain access to the resource.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden bruker informasjonen i den <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.Credentials%2A>egenskapen etter behov for å få tilgang til ressursen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.Credentials%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: There is no `get` accessor to this property for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen `get` aksessor for denne egenskapen av sikkerhetsgrunner.

trans-unit.source: When overwriting <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>, **GetEntity** is the method that utilizes the credential information in the **Credentials** property.
trans-unit.target: Når du overskriver <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>, **GetEntity** er metoden som benytter legitimasjonsinformasjon i den **legitimasjonen** egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: Resolving all other XML resources is very similar to resolving DTDs.
trans-unit.target: Løsing av andre XML-ressurser ligner løsning DTDer.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> negotiates the connection with the external resource and returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> representation of the content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>forhandler tilkobling til den eksterne ressursen, og returnerer en <xref:System.IO.Stream>representasjon av innholdet.</xref:System.IO.Stream></xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: The object that is making the call to <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> interprets the stream.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som gjør kallet til <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>tolker dataflyten.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: Extending the XmlUrlResolver class The default behavior of the XmlUrlResolver class is to resolve an XML data resource from its source, not from cache.
trans-unit.target: Utvider klassen XmlUrlResolver standard virkemåte for klassen XmlUrlResolver er å løse et XML-Dataressurs fra kilden, ikke fra hurtigbufferen.

trans-unit.source: In some cases, resolving a data resource from cache can improve the performance of an application by saving a trip to the data resource's server.
trans-unit.target: I noen tilfeller kan løse en Dataressurs fra hurtigbufferen forbedre ytelsen til en applikasjon ved å lagre en tur til data-ressursen serveren.

trans-unit.source: The performance gains here must be weighed against the need for up-to-date content.
trans-unit.target: Bedre her må vektet mot behovet for oppdatert innhold.

trans-unit.source: The following example extends XmlUrlResolver and builds a new class, `XmlCachingResolver`, to retrieve resources from the cache.
trans-unit.target: Følgende eksempel utvider XmlUrlResolver og bygger en ny klasse `XmlCachingResolver`, for å hente ressurser fra hurtigbufferen.

trans-unit.source: This is done by overriding the <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntity%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres ved å overstyre den <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen og <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode.</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntity%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlCachingResolver_ex#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlurlresol_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlCachingResolver_ex#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlurlresol_1.cs)] The caching behavior of the `XmlCachingResolver` class is implemented in the `GetEntity` method.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlCachingResolver_ex Nr.&1;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlurlresol_1.vb)][!code-cs[XmlCachingResolver_ex Nr.&1;](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlurlresol_1.cs) ] hurtigbufring virkemåten for den `XmlCachingResolver` klassen er implementert i den `GetEntity` metoden.

trans-unit.source: This is done by creating new <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy> objects.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres ved oppretting av ny <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>og <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy>objekter.</xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy> object is created using the <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCacheLevel> member of the <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCacheLevel> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy>objektet er opprettet ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCacheLevel>medlem av den <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCacheLevel>opplisting.</xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCacheLevel> </xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCacheLevel> </xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CachePolicy%2A> property of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object is set with the <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CachePolicy%2A>for den <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>objekt er angitt med den <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy>objektet.</xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CachePolicy%2A>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the `XmlCachingResolver` class is created with the `Boolean``enableHttpCaching`.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av den `XmlCachingResolver` klassen opprettes med den `Boolean``enableHttpCaching`.

trans-unit.source: When this value is set to `true`, the instance resolves a resource from the default cache if possible.
trans-unit.target: Når denne verdien er satt til `true`, forekomsten løser en ressurs fra hurtigbufferen standard hvis mulig.

trans-unit.source: When `enableHttpCaching` is set to `false`, the instance uses the default behavior and resolves resources from their source.
trans-unit.target: Når `enableHttpCaching` er satt til `false`, forekomsten bruker standard virkemåte, og løser ressurser fra kilden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This example leverages the extensibility of the XML classes in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Dette eksemplet har utvidelse av XML-klasser i .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Other classes can be extended and customized to suit the needs of a particular application.
trans-unit.target: Andre klasser kan utvidet og tilpasses etter behov for en bestemt applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cache policy for the underlying <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir policy for hurtigbuffer for den underliggende <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>objektet.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The cache policy for the underlying web request.
trans-unit.target: Policy for hurtigbufferen for den underliggende Webforespørselen.

trans-unit.source: Sets credentials used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: Angir brukerlegitimasjonen som skal brukes til å godkjenne webforespørsler.

trans-unit.source: If the virtual directory does not require authentication, this property does not need to be set.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den virtuelle mappen ikke krever godkjenning, behøver ikke denne egenskapen må være angitt.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the credentials of the user must be supplied.
trans-unit.target: Ellers må legitimasjonen for brukeren angis.

trans-unit.source: You can associate different credentials with different URIs and add them to a cache.
trans-unit.target: Du kan knytte annen legitimasjon til annen URIer og Legg dem til en hurtigbuffer.

trans-unit.source: You can then use the credentials to check authentication for different URIs, regardless of the original source of the XML.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter bruke legitimasjonen til å kontrollere godkjenning for forskjellige URIer, uavhengig av den opprinnelige kilden for XML.

trans-unit.source: The following C# code shows how to set the Credentials property to a credential cache.
trans-unit.target: C# koden nedenfor viser hvordan du tilbakestiller legitimasjonen-egenskapen til en hurtigbuffer for legitimasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The credentials to be used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: Legitimasjonen som skal brukes til å godkjenne webforespørsler.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the value defaults to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; that is, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlUrlResolver" name="XmlUrlResolver" href=""></xref> has no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er angitt, bruker du verdien på <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>; som er den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlUrlResolver" name="XmlUrlResolver" href=""> </xref> har ingen brukerlegitimasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: Tilordner en URI-adresse til et objekt som inneholder den faktiske ressursen.

trans-unit.source: This method is used when the caller wants to map a given URI to an object that contains the resource that the URI represents.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes når oppkalleren ønsker å tilordne en gitt URI til et objekt som inneholder ressursen URIEN representerer.

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntityAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha asynkrone versjon av denne metoden, kan du se <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntityAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntityAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Your application can mitigate memory denial of service threats to the GetEntity method by implementing IStream<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IStream> to limit the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Programmet, kan begrense minne avslått for tjenesten trusler til metoden GetEntity ved å implementere IStream<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IStream> til å begrense antall byte som leses.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IStream>

trans-unit.source: This helps guard against situations where malicious code attempts to pass an infinite stream of bytes to the GetEntity method.
trans-unit.target: Dette bidrar til å beskytte mot situasjoner der skadelig kode prøver å sende en uendelig dataflyten for byte til GetEntity-metoden.

trans-unit.source: The URI returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.ResolveUri*>.
trans-unit.target: URIEN som er returnert fra <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.ResolveUri*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.ResolveUri*>

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: For øyeblikket brukt ikke.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: Objekttypen som skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: The current implementation only returns <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende implementeringen returnerer bare <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekter.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A stream object or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a type other than stream is specified.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for dataflyten eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis en annen type enn dataflyten er angitt.

trans-unit.source: ofObjectToReturn is neither nor a type.
trans-unit.target: ofObjectToReturnverken eller en type.

trans-unit.source: The specified URI is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte URIEN er ikke en absolutt URI.

trans-unit.source: absoluteUri is .
trans-unit.target: absoluteUriis .

trans-unit.source: There is a runtime error (for example, an interrupted server connection).
trans-unit.target: Det er en kjøretidsfeil (for eksempel en avbrutt servertilkobling).

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront tilordner en URI-adresse til et objekt som inneholder den faktiske ressursen.

trans-unit.source: The URI returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.ResolveUri*>.
trans-unit.target: URIEN som er returnert fra <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.ResolveUri*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.ResolveUri*>

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: For øyeblikket brukt ikke.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: Objekttypen som skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: The current implementation only returns <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende implementeringen returnerer bare <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekter.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A stream object or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a type other than stream is specified.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for dataflyten eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis en annen type enn dataflyten er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the network proxy for the underlying <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir nettverket proxyen for den underliggende <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>objektet.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> to use to access the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>skal brukes til å få tilgang til Internett-ressursen.</xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>

trans-unit.source: Resolves the absolute URI from the base and relative URIs.
trans-unit.target: Løser den absolutte URIEN fra basistypen og den relative URIer.

trans-unit.source: The absolute URI can be used as the base URI for any subsequent requests for entities that are relative to this URI.
trans-unit.target: Den absolutte URIEN kan brukes som basis-URIEN for etterfølgende forespørsler for enheter som er relative til denne URIEN.

trans-unit.source: The base URI used to resolve the relative URI.
trans-unit.target: Basis-URIEN er brukt til å løse den relative URIEN.

trans-unit.source: The URI to resolve.
trans-unit.target: URIEN ikke løse.

trans-unit.source: The URI can be absolute or relative.
trans-unit.target: URIEN kan være en absolutt eller relativ.

trans-unit.source: If absolute, this value effectively replaces the `baseUri` value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis absolutt denne effektivt erstatter det `baseUri` verdi.

trans-unit.source: If relative, it combines with the `baseUri` to make an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: Hvis relative, den kombinerer med den `baseUri` foreta en absolutt URI.

trans-unit.source: The absolute URI, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the relative URI cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Den absolutte URIEN eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den relative URIEN kan ikke løses.

trans-unit.source: baseUri is or relativeUri is .
trans-unit.target: baseUriis or relativeUri is .
